This mod changes the odds of survivor's gender being female to 1000:1 instead of the default 50/50.
	
Also: doesn't change the 'special' survivor odds or gender - just the vanilla survivors.

Alternate mod for just Dudes: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1394562472] Apocalypse Sausage Simulation[/url]
